name: Tossed Away
description:
Controls

Movement - [WASD]
Aim - Mouse
Throw Rib - Mouse Left Click
Ground Slam - Mouse Right Click
Pause - BackSpace
Exit - Escape

Story

Summoned by his master Necromancer, our skeleton friend must venture below, into unknown crypts for... A cookbook?!?

Mechanics

Throw ribs at the  rune pillars to destroy the warlocks gates. Watch out though! Your ribs are also your health. 

Collaborators and Contributors

  • Dylan MacKay (popcornflood) - Environmental Art, Props, FX 
  • Cas Vander Grift (Ryken) - SFX, sound design and audio implementation 
  • Adam Saunders  @AudioTryhard - Music and additional SFX
  • Glen Taylor - Menu Art, Player UI, Art
  • Weston Vincze - Developer, Animator, Art master hand  
  • Phillyp Henning - Developer, Writer, Level Designer

Bought Assets

Monsters Art -  Ismartal - https://ismartal.artstation.com/
Environment - Szadi Art - https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/40094

Source Code

https://github.com/Roasted-Goblin-Studio/7DRL-Jam
